Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents a game instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(ModelView modelview)
      Initializes a new Game instance using the provided ModelView. Creates an empty list for common goal cards, assigns the given ModelView to the game's modelview field, and initializes a new Board instance based on the provided ModelView.
      Parameters:
      modelview - The ModelView object representing the game state.

    • addPlayers

      public void addPlayers(ArrayList<String> nicknames) throws Exception
      Adds players to the game with randomly determined play order.
      Parameters:
      nicknames - An ArrayList of player nicknames.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the file is not found or there is an error reading the file.

    • generateRandomNumber

      public ArrayList<Integer> generateRandomNumber(int range, int numOfGenerated)
      Generates a specified number of unique random numbers within a given range.
      Parameters:
      range - The range of numbers from which to generate random numbers.
      numOfGenerated - The number of unique random numbers to generate.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the generated unique random numbers.

    • createCommonGoalCard

      public void createCommonGoalCard(GameRules gameRules, ArrayList<Integer> numbers) throws Exception
      Reads from the JSON file the number of objects to instantiate (numOfCommonGoals) and the number of possible entities to instantiate (numOfPossibleCommonGoalsCards). Using an array of classes, it instantiates only the subclasses of CommonGoalCard at the positions specified by the numbers in the ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      gameRules - The game rules containing the mapping of numbers to class names.
      numbers - The ArrayList of numbers indicating the positions of subclasses to instantiate.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the file is not found or there is an error reading the file.

    • setCommonGoalCardsPoints

      public void setCommonGoalCardsPoints(GameRules gameRules) throws Exception
      Sets the scores for the CommonGoalCards based on the number of players in the game. The scores are read from the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      gameRules - The game rules containing the scores for the CommonGoalCards.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the file is not found or there is an error reading the file.

    • createPersonalGoalCard

      public void createPersonalGoalCard(GameRules gameRules, ArrayList<Integer> numbers)
      Instantiates the personal goal cards for each player based on the specified positions in the numbers list. Additionally, it sets up the reference bookshelf and common goal points for each player.
      Parameters:
      gameRules - The game rules containing the personal goal card information.
      numbers - The list of positions indicating which personal goal cards to instantiate for each player.

    • updateAdjacentPoints

      public void updateAdjacentPoints(GameRules gameRules)
      Updates the adjacent points of the current player by reading the associated scores from the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      gameRules - The game rules containing the scores for adjacent tile groups.

    • updatePointsCommonGoals

      public void updatePointsCommonGoals()
      Updates the common goal points of the current player and updates the modelView if a token is reached.

    • updatePersonalGoalPoints

      public void updatePersonalGoalPoints(GameRules gameRules)
      Updates the personal goal points of the current player based on the associated score read from the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      gameRules - The game rules containing the scores for personal goals.

    • updateAllPoints

      public void updateAllPoints() throws Exception
      Updates all the points of the current player and sets the updated scores in the modelView.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the file is not found or there is an error reading the file.

    • isEndGame

      public boolean isEndGame()
      Retrieves the value of the endGame flag.
      Returns:
      The value of the endGame flag.

    • setEndGame

      public void setEndGame(boolean endGame)
      Sets the end game status.
      Parameters:
      endGame - true if a player has completed their bookshelf, indicating the end of the game; false otherwise.

    • getModelView

      public ModelView getModelView()
      Retrieves the modelView associated with the game.
      Returns:
      The ModelView object representing the game state.
